mapper.select: SELECT h.id, m.nickname, h.place_title, h.created_at, h.content_img, h.like_count, h.view_count FROM hot_place_board h, member m WHERE h.member_id = m.member_id
SELECT h.id, m.nickname, h.place_title, h.place_content ,h.created_at, h.content_img, h.like_count, h.view_count FROM hot_place_board h, member m WHERE h.member_id = m.member_id AND h.id=#{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO hot_place_board (member_id, place_title, place_content) VALUES (#{memberId}, #{placeTitle}, #{placeContent})
mapper.update: UPDATE hot_place_board SET place_title = #{placeTitle}, place_content = #{placeContent}, content_img = #{contentImg} WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE hot_place_board SET view_count = view_count+1 WHERE id = #{id}
